letter:
Dear [Teacher's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to sincerely apologize for my actions during the recent test. I made a grave mistake by choosing to cheat, and I deeply regret that decision. 

I understand that my actions were not only unfair to my classmates but also to you as my teacher, who works hard to provide us with a fair and honest learning environment. I take full responsibility for my behavior and the breach of trust it caused. 

Reflecting on this situation, I realize the importance of integrity in both my academic pursuits and my personal growth. I promise to learn from this experience and to ensure it does not happen again in the future. I am committed to improving myself and demonstrating that I can be a responsible and honest student.

Thank you for your understanding, and I hope to earn back your trust as I strive to do better moving forward.

Sincerely,  
[Your Name]
